changelog:
V1.4 January 2020

*Added tip layouts
*Added: Complete new music player experience
*Added: SoundCloud music downloads
*Added: Local music playing option
*Added: Equalizer and audio effects
*Added: Lyrics finding option
*Added: Mp3 converter, Sleep Timer
*Added: Lots of feature can't remember
*Updated: Search tab with more personalized songs
*Updated: Faster search results
*Updated: UI and fixes
*Fixed: Spotify playlist download not working
*Fixed: Some YouTube links not working
*Fixed: App not working on Lollipop devices
